'Liz Claiborne Inc.' (NYSE: LIZ), which became 'Fifth & Pacific Companies Inc.'
(NYSE: FNP) on May 15, 2012, was a fashion company founded in 1976 in New York
City that designed and marketed a wide range of women's and men's apparel,
accessories and fragrance products.
categories: Companies listed on the New York Stock Exchange
Companies based in New York City
